com.example.android.arrival.Util

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.arrival.Util.AccountManager

  • public class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton object used to manage all actions pertaining to an account

      • deleteAccountData

        public void deleteAccountData(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              AccountCallbackListener listener)
        this method deletes all instances of user data in firebase
        Parameters:
        email - user email used to reauthenticate before deletion
        password - user password used to reauthenticate before deletion
        listener - callback listener to be used by activity that calls it

        listener - listener for method success or failure
